scripts.prebuild: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const dataPath = path.join(__dirname, 'app/lib/data.ts'); const examplePath = path.join(__dirname, 'app/lib/data.example.ts'); if (!fs.existsSync(dataPath) && fs.existsSync(examplePath)) { fs.copyFileSync(examplePath, dataPath); console.log('Copied data.example.ts to data.ts'); }"
